titleStmt.title: The marriage of Oceanus and Brittania an allegoricall fiction, really declaring Englands riches, glory, and puissance by sea : to be represented in musick, dances, and proper scenes / all invented, written, and composed by Richard Fleckno.
titleStmt.author: Flecknoe, Richard, d. 1678?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
